'''1.21.2 Release Candidate 1''' (known as '''1.21.2-rc1''' in the [[launcher]]) is the first [[release candidate]] for [[Java Edition 1.21.2]], released on October 17, 2024,<ref>{{cite|url=https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/article/minecraft-1-21-2-release-candidate-1|title=Minecraft 1.21.2 Release Candidate 1|date=October 17, 2024|website=Minecraft.net}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Fixes ==
{{Fixes|fixedin=1.21.2 Release Candidate 1
|;From 1.21
|273812|Intersection chests in trial chambers not generating correctly.
|;prev
|277636|Projectiles visually fall when relogging.
|277638|Client sometimes rejects a set passengers packet.
}}</onlyinclude>
